name: SRAuthorizationStatus
desc: The states that model whether the user approves the app to read a particular sensor.

items.name: case notDetermined
items.desc: Indicates the user has not answered the in-app approval prompt.

items.name: case authorized
items.desc: Indicates the user approved the app’s access to the reader’s sensor.

items.name: case denied
items.desc: Indicates the user declined the app’s access to a particular sensor.
